sect2.para: Converts a stream from char (byte) data type to float (real) data type.

sect3.para: Specifies the vector length for vector processing. Typical applications will use the default value of 1.
Sets the scaling factor of the output value. The default value of 1 will give 0 => 0.0, 1 => 1.0, 2 => 2.0, ..., 255 => 255.0. If it is desired to normalize the value to 1.0, enter 256.0
